column4: The roadway is back open at this time following a collision involving a tanker truck.
Motorists on the interstate and on the detour route should continue using added caution while traffic flow returns to normal.
Citation Blvd at Jaggie Fox Way
column5: All eastbound lanes (toward Georgetown Rd) are shut down.

column4: The westbound direction (toward Malabu Dr) is closed until Friday 5/26 for full depth repaving.
Detour via Zandale Dr -> Bellefonte Dr -> Malabu Dr.
